attributes.action: stay till hes ready to go!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i'm sick of people trying to shun people out lets stop worrying whos got to go and worry about where our country is going

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
